title: You'll Sleigh the Game on Instagram With These Clever Christmas Captions
text:
From Country Living

'Tis the season for taking pictures! From making your own Christmas cards and decorating holiday cookies to wearing matching pajamas and trimming the Christmas tree with your family, there are so many moments to capture on camera. And if you take a photo but don't post it on social media, did it ever really exist? (According to your kids, no. 😂) As you work through your Christmas bucket list this year, focus on taking Instagram-worthy photos and leave the hard part up to us. We came up with the ultimate list of Christmas Instagram captions that will you get through the entire holiday season.

Are you the Cousin Eddie of your friend group? Make everyone laugh with a funny Christmas caption that shows your personality (and helps everyone forget that your RV is parked in the driveway). If you like to keep things simple, forget about words and let some festive emojis do the talking in your post. Want a family-friendly caption that will give your dad's jokes a run for his money? Look snow further—there are plenty of clever Christmas puns to choose from. And for those of you who have been binge-watching Christmas movies on Netflix since August, you can't go wrong with a movie quote caption (because Buddy the Elf always knows what to say).

Regardless of what kind of Christmas caption you want to use, these cute and funny phrases will help you sleigh the Instagram game this year.

Funny Christmas Captions

View photos Photo credit: Vasyl Dolmatov More

Dear Santa...I can explain.

Me, 11 months of the year: "Slay." Me in December: "Sleigh."

Let's get lit!

All I want for Christmas is you food.

food. Dreaming of a white Christmas (but if the white runs out, I'll drink the red).

Bah, humbug.

Forget the figgy pudding, I want cookies!

Relationship status: Single and ready to jingle.

Red wine pairs well with a crazy family.

Feelin' frosty.

Petition to celebrate Christmas year-round. Sign below!

Consider this photo my Christmas card to all of you.

The Festival of Lights? More like the Festival of Carbs.

Dear Santa ... define "nice."

December isn't over yet, but I already understand how the Grinch felt.

Christmas cheer? I thought you said Christmas beer ...

Feliz naughty dog.

To-do list: Eat, drink, nap.

Has anyone ever actually had figgy pudding?

'Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the house, not a creature was stirring (except for people with kids who still believe in Santa).

I'm on the naughty list.

Most parents: Don't forget to leave out milk and cookies! Me, an intellectual: Santa told Mommy he wants wine this year.

'Tis the season for stretchy pants.

Ho^3

That's a wrap! No, seriously—I finally finished wrapping the gifts.

It's beginning to *cost* a lot like Christmas...

Cute Christmas Captions

View photos Photo credit: bernardbodo More

"It is Christmas in the heart that puts Christmas in the air."

May your days be merry and bright.

"My idea of Christmas, whether old-fashioned or modern, is very simple: loving others."

If kisses were snowflakes, I'd send you a blizzard.

All is calm, all is bright.

"Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind."

It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas!

"Love the giver more than the gift."

Meet me under the mistletoe.

Although it's been said, many times, many ways ... Merry Christmas to you

My favorite color is Christmas lights.

"One of the most glorious messes in the world is the mess created in the living room on Christmas Day."

On the first day of Christmas, my true love gave to me ...

All I want for Christmas is you!

Snuggled up together, like two birds of a feather would be ...
